descriptionHtml:
[youtube]iVGgXqdKIhE[/youtube]
Hell Buster

[youtube]_ePMeWXw6q8[/youtube]
Hell Buster Launcher

The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
Hell Buster Mod by elysees

2 kinds of magic will be added automatically
they are Hell Buster & Hell Buster Launcher

Hell Buster
=========
-Lesser Power
-Damage : (OneHanded or TwoHanded) Higher Value 40% * 20Hit (24Area)
-Require : Stamina 15 * 20 Hit

Hell Buster Launcher
=================
-Lesser Power
-Damage : (OneHanded or TwoHanded) Higher Value 40% * 20Hit (Range 10000, 16Radius)
-Require : Stamina 15 * 20 Hit

Edit Console Command
===================
` > Set HellBDamageRate to 1.0           //default value: 1.0 (1.0=100%)
` > Set HellBStamina to 15.0                //default value: Require Stamina 15.0
` > Set HellBHit to 20                          //default value: Max Hit 20
` > Set HellBDelay to 0.5                     //default value: Damage Hit Delay Time 0.5 Second



*Feel free to use everything in this file.
